summary: THE TWO FRONT SEAT BELTS WERE RECALLED AND REPLACED BY AN AUTHORIZED DEALER.  AFTER THE REPAIRS WERE MADE THE CONSUMER REALIZED THE REMOUNTING OF THE NEW SEAT BELTS PREVENTED THE SEATS FROM ROTATING 180 DEGREES AND THE CONSUMER CAN NO LONGER USE THE EAT FOR ADDITIONAL SEATING IN THE LIVING ROOM AREA OF THE MOTORHOME.  THE SEAT BELTS ALSO DON'T FIT PROPERLY.       PH   *NLM
